ValidationRule.description: Cannot save record when VoIP is checked and Security Option is Optional or Mandatory.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (voipAllowed__c = true) && or(ispickval( Security_Passcode__c ,"Optional Security"),or(ispickval( Security_Passcode__c , "Mandatory Security")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Security Option is set to Optional or Mandatory, VoIP cannot be enabled.
